title: Q1 Marketing Strategy Presentation
content: In this presentation, we reviewed our Q1 objectives, including increasing brand awareness by 20%, optimizing ad spend ROI, and launching the new referral program. We analyzed past campaign data, identified key demographics, and discussed creative concepts. The executive team provided feedback on budget allocation and asked for a deeper dive into social media metrics. We concluded with a timeline for campaign rollouts and assigned owners for each initiative.
summary: Detailed Q1 marketing roadmap with timelines, budgets, and assigned responsibilities.
